this game has got the music story and the aesthetics to make a good cyberpunk game  sadly though mercury man is weighed down by bad english translation and the worst isometric shooter combat ive ever seen in my life if you can stomach a game with a badly translated english dialogue and a pisspoor shooting combat gameplay you can maybe try it out on sale other than that i would say that the game is absolutely not worth your time and or money
